Author: Microsoft Developer
Title: Reimagine migration: Agentic platform landing zone with Azure Migrate
Description:
Migrating workloads to Azure is often complex and prone to manual errors, leading to inconsistent environments and compliance risks. This episode of the Azure Essentials Show introduces Azure Migrate’s automated, agentic approach to Azure Landing Zone deployment, showing how guided migration ensures every workload inherits a secure, compliant foundation built on Microsoft’s best practices. Join Thomas and Shiva for expert insights and a practical demo, to learn how to modernize confidently and maximize your cloud investment.
